description: This Dart file defines the InventoryPage widget and related components for managing product inventory, including listing products and a form for adding or editing products in a Flutter app.

classes.name: InventoryPage
classes.description: A stateless widget that displays the inventory list with options to add or edit products.

classes.name: ProductFormSheet
classes.description: A stateful widget that presents a modal sheet for creating or editing a product.

methods.name: _openForm
methods.description: Opens a modal bottom sheet to create or edit a product.

methods.name: _submit
methods.description: Handles the submission of the product form, creating or updating a product in the service.
